entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 50
